issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A user story. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.
issuetype.name: Story

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I've created snapshot and provided a description.
{code}
root@eucahost-51-144:~# euca-create-snapshot --description Test --debug vol-8ACA3D84
2012-08-28 10:38:20,110 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Method: POST
2012-08-28 10:38:20,110 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Path: /services/Eucalyptus/
2012-08-28 10:38:20,110 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Data: 
2012-08-28 10:38:20,110 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Headers: {}
2012-08-28 10:38:20,110 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Host: 192.168.51.144:8773
2012-08-28 10:38:20,110 euca2ools [DEBUG]:establishing HTTP connection: kwargs={}
2012-08-28 10:38:20,110 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Token: None
2012-08-28 10:38:20,110 euca2ools [DEBUG]:using _calc_signature_2
2012-08-28 10:38:20,111 euca2ools [DEBUG]:query string: AWSAccessKeyId=4DNBUYWXUPNDFWEUZJUAJ&Action=CreateSnapshot&Description=Test&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2012-08-28T17%3A38%3A20Z&Version=2009-11-30&VolumeId=vol-8ACA3D84
2012-08-28 10:38:20,111 euca2ools [DEBUG]:string_to_sign: POST
192.168.51.144:8773
/services/Eucalyptus/
AWSAccessKeyId=4DNBUYWXUPNDFWEUZJUAJ&Action=CreateSnapshot&Description=Test&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2012-08-28T17%3A38%3A20Z&Version=2009-11-30&VolumeId=vol-8ACA3D84
2012-08-28 10:38:20,111 euca2ools [DEBUG]:len(b64)=44
2012-08-28 10:38:20,111 euca2ools [DEBUG]:base64 encoded digest: EMRXaSITrgejtUGz+CgVBBy0MQmuxSxyvFhqGYILswM=
2012-08-28 10:38:20,111 euca2ools [DEBUG]:query_string: AWSAccessKeyId=4DNBUYWXUPNDFWEUZJUAJ&Action=CreateSnapshot&Description=Test&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2012-08-28T17%3A38%3A20Z&Version=2009-11-30&VolumeId=vol-8ACA3D84 Signature: EMRXaSITrgejtUGz+CgVBBy0MQmuxSxyvFhqGYILswM=
send: 'POST /services/Eucalyptus/ HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: 192.168.51.144:8773\r\nAccept-Encoding: identity\r\nContent-Length: 256\r\nContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8\r\nUser-Agent: Boto/2.2.2 (linux2)\r\n\r\nAWSAccessKeyId=4DNBUYWXUPNDFWEUZJUAJ&Action=CreateSnapshot&Description=Test&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2012-08-28T17%3A38%3A20Z&Version=2009-11-30&VolumeId=vol-8ACA3D84&Signature=EMRXaSITrgejtUGz%2BCgVBBy0MQmuxSxyvFhqGYILswM%3D'
reply: 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n'
header: Content-Length: 320
header: Content-Type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8
2012-08-28 10:38:20,351 euca2ools [DEBUG]:<CreateSnapshotResponse xmlns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2009-11-30/"><snapshotId>snap-4BFA406B</snapshotId><volumeId>vol-8ACA3D84</volumeId><status>pending</status><startTime>2012-08-28T17:38:20.196Z</startTime><progress>0%</progress><ownerId>837374580709</ownerId><volumeSize>1</volumeSize></CreateSnapshotResponse>
{code}

Snapshot is created but CLC does not provide its description back to the client.
{code}
root@eucahost-51-144:~# euca-describe-snapshots --debug 
2012-08-28 10:47:35,509 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Method: POST
2012-08-28 10:47:35,509 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Path: /services/Eucalyptus/

send: 'POST /services/Eucalyptus/ HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: 192.168.51.144:8773\r\nAccept-Encoding: identity\r\nContent-Length: 244\r\nContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8\r\nUser-Agent: Boto/2.2.2 (linux2)\r\n\r\nAWSAccessKeyId=4DNBUYWXUPNDFWEUZJUAJ&Action=DescribeSnapshots&RestorableBy=self&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2012-08-28T17%3A47%3A35Z&Version=2010-08-31&Signature=Wn9WKBAt%2F4rpKxirOSRXIfK%2FiRgolcLCS%2FiXNz7q2%2Bs%3D'

2012-08-28 10:47:35,559 euca2ools [DEBUG]:<DescribeSnapshotsResponse xmlns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2010-08-31/"><snapshotSet><item><snapshotId>snap-4BFA406B</snapshotId><volumeId>vol-8ACA3D84</volumeId><status>completed</status><startTime>2012-08-28T17:38:20.196Z</startTime><progress>100%</progress><ownerId>837374580709</ownerId><volumeSize>1</volumeSize></item></snapshotSet></DescribeSnapshotsResponse>

comments.body:
Descriptions for snapshots are now supported, but are not displayed in the output from the current version of euca-describe-snapshots (looks like the command now supports description due to changes in TOOLS-52)

{code}
[root@eucahost-51-193 ~]# euca-create-snapshot -d "My Snapshot" vol-5E353CFD
SNAPSHOT	snap-F3753E28	vol-5E353CFD	pending	2012-09-08T01:12:22.254Z	0%	My Snapshot
[root@eucahost-51-193 ~]# euca-describe-snapshots --debug
2012-09-07 18:12:38,451 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Method: POST
2012-09-07 18:12:38,451 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Path: /services/Eucalyptus/
2012-09-07 18:12:38,451 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Data: 
2012-09-07 18:12:38,451 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Headers: {}
2012-09-07 18:12:38,451 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Host: 192.168.51.193:8773
2012-09-07 18:12:38,451 euca2ools [DEBUG]:establishing HTTP connection: kwargs={}
2012-09-07 18:12:38,452 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Token: None
2012-09-07 18:12:38,452 euca2ools [DEBUG]:using _calc_signature_2
2012-09-07 18:12:38,453 euca2ools [DEBUG]:query string: AWSAccessKeyId=FQIYM3DQ5OTSVDUAOEHBH&Action=DescribeSnapshots&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2012-09-08T01%3A12%3A38Z&Version=2010-08-31
2012-09-07 18:12:38,453 euca2ools [DEBUG]:string_to_sign: POST
192.168.51.193:8773
/services/Eucalyptus/
AWSAccessKeyId=FQIYM3DQ5OTSVDUAOEHBH&Action=DescribeSnapshots&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2012-09-08T01%3A12%3A38Z&Version=2010-08-31
2012-09-07 18:12:38,453 euca2ools [DEBUG]:len(b64)=44
2012-09-07 18:12:38,453 euca2ools [DEBUG]:base64 encoded digest: 7gOq2oj6pN1MrEgg3mXW2FZ19whx6KgLmeGPJwPfrck=
2012-09-07 18:12:38,453 euca2ools [DEBUG]:query_string: AWSAccessKeyId=FQIYM3DQ5OTSVDUAOEHBH&Action=DescribeSnapshots&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2012-09-08T01%3A12%3A38Z&Version=2010-08-31 Signature: 7gOq2oj6pN1MrEgg3mXW2FZ19whx6KgLmeGPJwPfrck=
send: 'POST /services/Eucalyptus/ HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: 192.168.51.193:8773\r\nAccept-Encoding: identity\r\nContent-Length: 218\r\nContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8\r\nUser-Agent: Boto/2.5.2 (linux2)\r\n\r\n'
send: 'AWSAccessKeyId=FQIYM3DQ5OTSVDUAOEHBH&Action=DescribeSnapshots&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2012-09-08T01%3A12%3A38Z&Version=2010-08-31&Signature=7gOq2oj6pN1MrEgg3mXW2FZ19whx6KgLmeGPJwPfrck%3D'
reply: 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n'
header: Content-Length: 404
header: Content-Type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8
2012-09-07 18:12:38,747 euca2ools [DEBUG]:<DescribeSnapshotsResponse xmlns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2010-08-31/"><snapshotSet><item><snapshotId>snap-F3753E28</snapshotId><volumeId>vol-5E353CFD</volumeId><status>pending</status><startTime>2012-09-08T01:12:22.254Z</startTime><progress>0%</progress><ownerId>814614186295</ownerId><volumeSize>1</volumeSize><description>My Snapshot</description></item></snapshotSet></DescribeSnapshotsResponse>
SNAPSHOT	snap-F3753E28	vol-5E353CFD	pending	2012-09-08T01:12:22.254Z	0%
{code}

This issue was resolved in the latest build from source on 10/26/12.

Closing the bug.
